[`CapacitorAdapter`](CapacitorAdapter)

## CapacitorAdapter class

Implementation of the vault adapter for mobile devices.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class CapacitorAdapter implements DataAdapter 
```
**Implements:** [`DataAdapter`](DataAdapter)
